name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior IP Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in **Network Engineering**, **Routing**, **Switching**, and **Firewalls**. I possess a strong proficiency in **Automation** using **Ansible**, and **Python**, complemented by a solid understanding of **CISCO** technologies and **Stateful Firewalls**. My background includes hands-on experience with **F5**, **ACI**, and **5G** networking, as well as expertise in **IPv6** for robust network configurations.

I am adept at technical problem-solving and employ analytical skills to optimize network performance and ensure security compliance. My experience in **Bash** scripting enhances my ability to automate processes and streamline operations. Additionally, I am fluent in English, facilitating clear communication across teams. With a strong foundation in deploying enterprise-grade solutions, I am committed to delivering high-quality results within complex network environments.
